fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Budget, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Youth, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: -Discussion related to creating a publisher’s neighboring right to copyrighted works under EU legislation. Sanoma Media Finland Ltd. has responded to the open consultation “The role of publishers in the copyright value chain” on this issue on June 3, 2016.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: ACT, the Federation of the Finnish Media Industry Finnmedia, The Finnish Newspapers Association, Aikakausmedia
goals__remit: We offer information, experiences and entertainment through newspapers and magazines, television and radio as well as online and in mobile media in Finland.
